name: Campgrounds
description:
Go Camping.

In Campgrounds, you are dropped into remote wilderness deep in the Great Canadian Shield with nothing but the clothes on your back. This was your idea. You wanted to test your skills, see if you could really survive alone in the wild. Can you?

Manage your hunger, thirst, health and temperature in order to survive. The distant howling of wolves breaks the peaceful silence, and you are alone. Make a campfire, Collect rainwater and hunt wildlife. Try not to scare your prey, and avoid the sight of grey wolves, , and see how long you can survive.
